summary: Comprehensive testing of iteration 3 features: white-label (no emergent branding), logout/session management, Command Bar (Cmd+K), mobile side drawer (no bottom nav), login page split layout, and warehouse MongoDB data. Backend: 100% pass (14/14 tests). Frontend: All critical features working.

issues: Toast notification (Sonner) can intercept clicks on profile menu briefly after login - auto-dismisses after 2-3 seconds

critical_code_review_comments: AuthContext.js: Proper session timeout (30 min) with 2-min warning before logout
CommandBar.js: cmdk library v1.1.1 properly integrated with navigation items
DashboardLayout.js: Clean mobile drawer implementation, no bottom nav as per spec
warehouse.py: Auto-seeds data on first access, proper MongoDB integration
index.css: White-label CSS correctly hides emergent branding elements
seed_data_creation: Warehouse zones and depots auto-seeded to MongoDB on first access (4 zones, 4 depots)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 3 features working: 1) Login split layout with stats (50K+, 99.8%, 4.9), 2) Command Bar (Ctrl+K) with 16 nav items + logout option, 3) Mobile drawer (280px) with user info and logout - NO bottom nav, 4) Logout endpoints (/api/auth/logout, /api/auth/logout-all) working, 5) Warehouse data from MongoDB (4 zones, 4 depots), 6) White-label CSS hides emergent branding. Session timeout is 30 min with 2-min warning.

login_page.login_form: Email/password inputs with show/hide toggle working

dashboard.kpi_cards: 4 cards with gradient icons (Colis Actifs, Revenus, Taux Livraison, En Attente)

command_bar.navigation_items: 16 items found (Tableau de bord, Commandes, Import, Produits, etc.)
command_bar.logout_option: Déconnexion option present in quick actions
command_bar.logout_all_option: Déconnecter tous les appareils option present

mobile_layout.side_drawer: 280px with user avatar, name 'Sam Cherier', role 'Administrateur'

warehouse_page.zones_from_db: 4 zones (Zone Froide A1, Zone Sèche A2, Zone Fragile B1, Zone Standard B2)

api_endpoints_tested.POST /api/auth/logout-all: 200 OK - clears all sessions for user

white_label.emergent_branding: Not visible in UI (CSS display:none applied)
